name: SPF Road to Wastedmania
description:
The game is in the classic fighting arcade game style, with combo and special moves. The player can choose between: story mode, arcade mode and team battle mode. The Arcade Mode is a normal 1vs1, the Team Battle is a 3vs3 both for two players.

The wrestlers of the Smashing Potatoes Federation fight in a tournament for the world heavyweight championship belt. Each wrestler must beat all the others fighters and the evil Omega to win the title.
